snippet: The American prisoner of war, who was freed in exchange for Taliban detainees, will receive specialized treatment the military has designed for soldiers who have endured long periods in captivity.
abstract: Sgt Bowe Bergdahl, American prisoner of war who was freed in exchange for Taliban detainees, is to begin treatment at Texas military medical facility, starting final phase of reintegration process after nearly five years in captivity.

byline.original: By JULIE HIRSCHFELD DAVIS and ERIC SCHMITT

lead_paragraph: The American prisoner of war, who was freed in exchange for Taliban detainees, will receive specialized treatment the military has designed for soldiers who have endured long periods in captivity.

headline.main: Bergdahl Departs Germany for Treatment in Texas
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Departs Germany for Treatment in Texas
